snippet: Andrew Jackson O’Shaughnessy’s “The Men Who Lost America” is the winner of the New-York Historical Society’s annual American history book prize.
abstract: Andrew Jackson O’Shaughnessy’s “The Men Who Lost America” is the winner of the New-York Historical Society’s annual American history book prize.

headline.main: Book on Losing British Generals Wins American History Prize
headline.print_headline: Losers of Revolution  Yield Victory for Author
